```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
        echo = FALSE,
     message = FALSE,
     warning = FALSE,
     comment = "#>",
    collapse = TRUE,
   fig.width = 8,
  fig.height = 8
)

ggplot2::theme_set(hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum_rc())
```

## Selected Publications

```{r publications, results='asis'}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(readxl)

here("works", "works.xlsx") %>%
  read_xlsx("publications") %>%
  glue_data(
    "* [{Title}]({url}) by {Authors} in {Publication}"
  )
```

## Notes

```{r notes, results='asis'}
here("works", "works.xlsx") %>%
  read_xlsx("notes") %>%
  filter(include == 1) %>%
  arrange(desc(creation_date)) %>%
  glue_data(
    "* [{title}]({url_short}) - {description}"
  )
```

## Notebooks

```{r notebooks, results='asis'}
here("works", "works.xlsx") %>%
  read_xlsx("notebooks") %>%
  glue_data(
    "* [{title}]({url}) - {description}"
  )
```
